Category: Industry:     IT / Computers - Hardware & Networking ,   IT / Computers - Software
Job Description: Job Description   A Client Technical Specialist (CTS) is an end-to-end ICT infrastructure operational support consultant. CTS provides valuable operations management to address operational matters promptly and effectively across various internal teams – resulting in higher customer satisfaction and better SLA compliance for clients’ subscribed services.Besides having a good understanding of the client’s ICT infrastructure, a CTS is also familiar with client’s business requirements, subscribed services and technical support history. CTS continually monitors client’s technical support needs, tracks open incidents and service requests, and ensures technical and operational resources are aligned to resolve issues promptly and completely. The ultimate objectives are to expedite incident resolution, improve service performance and increase the overall quality of technical and operations support.By maintaining a long-term relationship with their clients, CTS gains both understanding and insight of their clients ICT organizations, its impact on overall business, their ICT goals, and their pain points - which are used by the CTS to ensure their clients operational success with products and services.Roles and ResponsibilitiesRolesResponsibilitiesGeneral Support· Provides client-focused operations support by working closely with various internal support teams (e.g. TAC, Business Product, Engineering & Tier-3 support)· Documents client’s ICT environment and operations for better support and understanding· Participates in client’s meetings related to operations supportService Request (SR) Support· Provides Service Request (SR) assessment, advice and support· Provides conference calls with client to report on and expedite SR issue (if any)· Provides periodic reports to client with the status of SRs· Participates in meetings related to client’s infrastructure changes to achieve zero unexpected outage, high customer satisfaction and trust, especially providing valuable advice to ensure smooth implementation of new or additional products and servicesIncident Management Support· Provide regular reports to Top Management on status of client’s incidents, including working closely with Major Incident Management team for consolidated status updates as need be· Point of contact for SM and manage the communications to client through SM· Provide conference calls with client (i.e. customer conference bridge) to report on and expedite incident (especially major incident)· Ensure the RFO / Incident report is produced within the required timeline· Provide inputs to Problem Management team· For major incidents, work with Major Incident Mgmt Team to:-o Lead and coordinate with the respective resolver groups including 3rd party vendors until incident resolution; and escalate to resolver group’s management where necessaryo Provide updates to management based on the pre-defined notification / escalation timeline

Category: Industry:     Banking / Accounting / Financial Services ,   ITES / BPO ,   IT / Computers - Software
Job Description: Job Description   ResponsibilitiesAs a key member of the team you will identify and analyze data that will help to answer the question: How can we dramatically increase the number of students who purchase and renewlearning programs. You will have a bias towards action and a focus on measuring everything with afocus on continual improvement. Your insights will be leveraged across social marketing,performance marketing and SEM/PPC, funnel management and conversion rate optimization andsearch engine optimization amongst other areas. You will work cross-functionally with our sales, marketing and operational teams to deliver against Acquisition and Business KPIs. You will be responsible for: Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets to develop a thorough understanding of company's Learning products, users, and acquisition channels.Develop actionable dashboards for decision makers across the company.Run exploratory analysis uncover new areas of opportunity, generate hypotheses, and quickly assess the potential upside of a given opportunity.Help execute projects to drive insights that lead to customer, enterprise client, and market growth.Work closely with other departments to anticipate analytics needs and to quantify the impact of existing features, future product changes, and marketing campaigns.Develop KPIs in partnership with each department to track health toward business goalsAnalyze, forecast, and build custom reports to make key performance indicators and insights available to the entire company.Monitor, optimize, and report on marketing and growth metrics and split-test results. Make recommendations based on analytics and test findings.Drive optimization and data minded culture inside the company.Develop frameworks, models, tools, and processes to ensure that analytical insights can be incorporated into all key decision making.Effectively present and communicate analysis to the company to drive business decisionsCore Competencies & Requirements: BA or BS degree in a quantitative field such as economics, mathematics, statistics, or computer science/engineering3+ years of proven work experience in a data analyst role for a technology company.Excellent analytical skills and problem-solving ability; the ability to answer unstructured business questions and work independently to drive projects to conclusion.Strong analytical skills with the capacity to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy.Experience extracting insights using advanced SQL to work efficiently at scale. Advanced expertise with commonly used analytics tools including Google Analytics, Looker and MS Excel.Strong knowledge of statistics, this includes experimental design for optimization, statistical significance, confidence intervals and predictive analytics techniques.Must be self-directed, organized and detail oriented as well as have the ability to multitask and work effectively in a fast-paced environment.Active team player, excellent communication skills, positive attitude and good work ethic.You come up with creative solutions to challenging problems.Experience with R, PHP, Python, Segment, Amplitude, and/or Looker.Experience working alongside product and data engineering/data science teams.Experience working in a e-commerce or recurring digital subscription business.Experience working at a high-growth startup.
